comments:
During debug, while looking at variables, clicking on one of the variable tree
expanders ("+"), will cause an error message and the strings in the variables
window are blanked out from then on.  That is, until I shut down the workbench
and restart it, the variables window is useless.  Here is the relevant entry
from the log:

Is this generally reproducable for you?
The line causing the NPE is after a check for whether that field is null and 
there is no settors for that field (it is only set in the constructor).

Could be a JIT bug? We had all sorts of trouble with the earlier 1.4.1 VMs. 
Are you able to try a later 1.4.1 or move to the 1.4.2 VMs?

Hi Darin,  
This happens 3-4 times a day if I am debugging a fair amount.  I cannot, so far
predict when it will occur.  It is rare enough that I am never paying attention
to the moments just before the failure.  If there was some kind of trace I could
turn on, I would be happy to.  I can also switch VMs, but that will ultimately
entail upgrading the whole team, which may be a little bit of a problem.  What
do you suggest?  

Wayne

Wayne, from our experience the 1.4.1 VMs had lots of issues. These appear to 
have been addressed in the latest builds (though I can't say personally as I 
have moved to 1.4.2).

I would either ensure that you are on the latest release of the 1.4.1 or move 
to the 1.4.2

Darin,


I have moved to 1.4.2, but it will take a couple of days to confirm whether this
fixes my issue because of the intermittent nature of the problem.  If there is
something in the dump that tells you how I could force it more often, please let
me know.

Wayne

That is the problem Wayne, the stack trace you produced should not be 
possible ;-)
Keep us posted.

Switched to 1.4.2 and problem stopped occuring.  Seems to be a JVM problem.

Wayne
